resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested
Students may borrow equipment and staff may edit or analyse the database with the requirement of a password.
Swipe right to see additional app functions.
Swipe left to check the equipment database or use the menu in the top-right to access a search function.
Welcome to the Lab Equipment Manager. Use the dropdown below to view the equipment database.
Click on a button below to select a mode. Your mode will influence which functions of the app you are able to access.
Enter your details and the details the item you wish to borrow in the spaces below.
Email an invoice of the borrow order?
Please double check the details and then confirm the order by pressing the button below.
